item.title: Ricky Gervais - Why I'm an Atheist
item.description: This is an article written by Ricky Gervais, for The Wall Street Journal back in 2010. Reproduced entirely here, as SpeakEasy seems not to be keep articles around long enough. If WSJ does not like what I have done, let me know and I will remove it, or adapt it to a compromise. Please do not sue me. Some emphasis mine. Ricky Gervais: Why I’m an Atheist Why don’t you believe in God?
